signupConfirm.title: Necesserary validation to complete signing up
signupConfirm.tr1: Thanks for signing up on Songpeek. You have one last thing to do.
signupConfirm.tr2: To complete your signup, please click on the following link:
signupConfirm.tr3: If you get any difficulty activating your account, please contact us at contact@songpeek.com.

signupComplete.title: Sign up complete
signupComplete.tr1: Merci de vous être inscrit sur Songpeek.
signupComplete.tr2: Si vous avez une remarque à faire, n'hésitez pas à nous en faire part sur la page contact du site.
signupComplete.tr3: If you get any difficulty on Songpeek, please contact us at contact@songpeek.com.

forgotten.title: Password reset
forgotten.tr1: You recently requested a password reset. Follow this link to pick a new one:
